item.title: Local RAG in Basque using Tulu-3
item.description: In recent months, Local LLMs have significantly improved, and some of them perform surprisingly well with Basque language. Among them, I want to highlight Tulu-3 70B, which shows good results in Basque when using the quantized version (q4_K_M). Until the Latxa instruction model becomes available, this is probably the best option for having conversations or generating text in Basque.
